title: Client does not fit screen
body:
So my client does not fit my screen(horizontally). Whenever I go to the client store I have to scroll horizontally to reach the rp purchase button. I know that I can drag the sides, but that also moves the client vertically. 


I have enough space horizontally for this not being a problem, if I was allowed to scale the client freely, but as i said it forces the client to move both horizontal and vertical at the same time.

It isn't a major problem but it's annoying to the point that it gets tedious browsing the client store for champs/runes ect.

Is there any way to fix this?

replies.body: I've seen a few reports on this today, and further investigation and troubleshooting has helped to discover a particular issue caused by a recent windows update.  The current workaround may be the following:  Right click the LoL icon -> Properties -> Compatibility Tab -> Check the "Disable Display Scaling on High DPI Settings" Box.  Hit okay, and you should be set!

Thanks for the quick response! 
It seems to have worked, as i now can see all the champs in the store
Thanks again.
